messages.Muhmmad A: I've provided the details and everything for the first step of ID verification, but when I start visual verification, I get timed out and receive error.Constantly getting Timed Out when trying to start Visual Verification call.How to proceed to next step?Need your help...!
messages.Jennifer C: I am having this same issue.I successfully verified my ID this morning; however, I am unable to initiate a video call to complete the process. Please advise. Thank you.
messages.Aleksandar D: Hi Jennifer,I'm sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you. Could you please try clearing your cache and cookies or use a different browser? Let us know if the issue persists after trying that so that we can assist you further.Thank you.

messages.Joanne Marie P: Hi Virgile,I'm sorry to hear that. Are you getting an error when trying to click on the start chat button? You may want to try using a different browser or clear your cache and cookies also. If that doesn't help, please let us know. Thank you.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Client ended contract abruptly after sending him pre-final ver of logo design

messages.Stefan M: Hello,I contacted a client that needed a simple logo. Before he hired me a made him a draft of the logo, and he liked it and agreed to hire me. We made a contract for 50$. I did the logo and sent him a pre-final version and told him that I would do mockups and send him different color variations. He said to change a minor thing on the design and I agreed, but he simply responded that he "doesn't need the mockups and sh**t" and abruptly ended the contract without an explanation. He also wants a refund of 50$ even though he hasn't paid me for any milestone. What's the best thing to do and what are my options. Can I get a bad review? Is there a way for UpWork or the client to pay 50$ for the project I spent valuable time on?Thanks in advance

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Re: Upwork refund so much with no reason, Client cheating in upwok? where is the hourly protection?

messages.Maulana Yusup A: Hello,This is my first time and maybe this is a bad experience for me while joining the Upwork.First, I have a new contract from x Client. I check she is a Payment Method Verified, because I don't see any contract for this client.Then, I ask to Upwork Customer Support to check is it safe or not to work with her and he say "Yes" it safe since we have hourly protection and Upwork will guarantee the hours he said.Then I started working with the tight deadline (2 weeks) and spent much time and healthy every week.when the deadline is coming up (2 weeks in the Friday) client was happy and he says will do the Demo for the project and she say will back in 1 week, and she ended the contract (due holiday or something).I have facing not quite right in the Friday, since I'm Top Rated and usually get Faster Payment and for this Client I don't get it, I wonder and I ask to Customer Service Upwork, and he says no problem as you work good because Upwork have Hourly Protection, Ok no problem for now.I have read the Payment Protection also, I'm working with the honest. If Im cheating in Upwork I don't want to create this Topic.Because the first week I got the Payment ProtectionSecond week (I don't get payment protection) could u imagine if I cheating the hourly exactly 53 hours, how can I get 53 hours if I cheating?I ask to Customer Support 3 times!and then next week in the Wednesday I got the payment with the email from CS the client unsuccessful payment bla bla bla and Upwork cover to pay.this time I'm happy because my hours in the first week is paid.and then next week (this is the last payment, same happen the payment is not Faster on the Friday) so I need to wait to next week on Wednesday (Today).I have an emails that means xxxx much my money refunded with Upwork with no reason, with no notification to me why this happen? this is very not fair, where is the hourly protection?While Im working so hard and spent much time and healthy and Upwork get refunded so easily?If Client cheating in this platform why they are here to cheating us Freelancers?I don't understand with this, Upwork not check the Work Diary? and just get refund from Freelancer?The refund almost fully, working so hard 53 hours a week it's very very not fair!I have told Upwork before started, and why this refunded happen in the last payment and exactly in the time for paying to freelancer, why Upwork not checking the client account when the contract still running?Is the Client cheated on Upwork? very easy to cheating freelancer.I'm joined Upwork in 2019, I have never facing this problem before all contracts and clients was good. but for now I have a bad experience very very bad experience because my work is not paid and Upwork not guaranteed the hours while u working so hard and spent much time and healthy?could u imagine how much hours you can gave daily when u working 53 hours in a week for 1 client? I have 3 clients. it means I have working more than 53 hours, and this client almost make me headache and not good for health because I need to work almost 12-14 hours a day for only 1 client.Anybody can help me with this problem, Please help is outside here and there has same experience with me?
messages.Jennifer M: There is a $2500 limit. Am I understanding you right that you got payment protection the previous week? That is why if that's true.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Does anyone know how long it usually takes for testimonials to appear?

messages.Preston H: It sounds like you did not qualify for Upwork Payment Protection.Do you already know what you did wrong, or do you need us to help you figure that out?
messages.Joanne Marie P: Hi Aprilyne,I checked your account, and it looks like our team is already assisting you directly on this ticket number:30722627. I can see that you have already replied to the ticket. The agent assisting you will update your ticket to help you further.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Re: Should I stop my tracker in which segments?

messages.Benny S: I just read about a post aboutwhen I should stop my tracker?However, I still have the question:should I stop my tracker in a 10 minutes segment, or when the screenshot is taken?Due sometimes you work xx:18 hrs,so these eight minutes should be considered within the working time and not the opposite.Also, I understand that the screenshot is useful to evidence my work, but Im not sure if this affect somehow in my working times.
messages.Rafsun S: My opinion is to continue the tracker as long as you work on the project.Don't worry about the 10 minutes or the screenshot. Tracking time and capturing screenshots is Upwork's job. It also counts the keyboard and mouse click. So longtime gap will show less performance though I believe, it doesn't always count 100% correct.I usually stop the tracker when I need to do other small things that might need one minute plus such as smoking (as I don't smoke in my home) or going washroom. I start the tracker again when I start the project.A screenshot is useful evidence. Now, if you browse something that is non-related to the project and if the screenshot was captured on that, a hard client might be dissatisfied.
messages.Jennifer M: I just read about a post aboutwhen I should stop my tracker?However, I still have the question:should I stop my tracker in a 10 minutes segment, or when the screenshot is taken?Due sometimes you work xx:18 hrs,so these eight minutes should be considered within the working time and not the opposite.Also, I understand that the screenshot is useful to evidence my work, but Im not sure if this affect somehow in my working times.I run it until the 9 minute mark just to make sure I have activity and don't start it any time after the 3 minute mark in the segment. The screenshot is what logs the time, but if you stop the tracker without having at least 7 minutes of activity you risk losing it if you need the payment protection or if the client disputes.

messages.Heather N: I had the exact same issue. Long story short, I realized my browser (Chrome) was the problem. I was able to connect via Safari. Make sure your 'block popups' feature is unchecked. Not sure if this will work for you, but it's worth a shot. Best of luck!

messages.Benny S: I just read about a post aboutwhen I should stop my tracker?However, I still have the question:should I stop my tracker in a 10 minutes segment, or when the screenshot is taken?Due sometimes you work xx:18 hrs,so these eight minutes should be considered within the working time and not the opposite.Also, I understand that the screenshot is useful to evidence my work, but Im not sure if this affect somehow in my working times.
messages.Rafsun S: My opinion is to continue the tracker as long as you work on the project.Don't worry about the 10 minutes or the screenshot. Tracking time and capturing screenshots is Upwork's job. It also counts the keyboard and mouse click. So longtime gap will show less performance though I believe, it doesn't always count 100% correct.I usually stop the tracker when I need to do other small things that might need one minute plus such as smoking (as I don't smoke in my home) or going washroom. I start the tracker again when I start the project.A screenshot is useful evidence. Now, if you browse something that is non-related to the project and if the screenshot was captured on that, a hard client might be dissatisfied.
messages.Jennifer M: I just read about a post aboutwhen I should stop my tracker?However, I still have the question:should I stop my tracker in a 10 minutes segment, or when the screenshot is taken?Due sometimes you work xx:18 hrs,so these eight minutes should be considered within the working time and not the opposite.Also, I understand that the screenshot is useful to evidence my work, but Im not sure if this affect somehow in my working times.I run it until the 9 minute mark just to make sure I have activity and don't start it any time after the 3 minute mark in the segment. The screenshot is what logs the time, but if you stop the tracker without having at least 7 minutes of activity you risk losing it if you need the payment protection or if the client disputes.

messages.Andrea G: HiRoman,Please know, we are not able to discuss details of another user's account with you because of privacy concerns. Users are not allowed to have more than one account regardless if the old account is closed. Please let your brother know he canreach out to us through our different support channels and we'll be happy to assist with reinstating his account.Thanks!
messages.Joanne Marie P: Hi Roman,Please have your brother refer to the information shared with him about his account status. You may also have him reach out to us directly. Please know that we are not able to discuss any information about another freelancer's account here in the community. Thank you for your understanding.

messages.John S: I've applied for a job in Customer Service and was contacted by the individual responsible for the post the same day informing me of being selected for the process of hiring. The message and posting disappeared and I was contacted through Skype to do a questionnaire process in which I did and was told I got selected for the job. I did NOT give out my personal information and I have a feeling this is very sketchy. Please help immediately.
messages.Mary W: Until you are officially hired on Upwork, you cannot connect with a potential client on Skype, Telegram, Hangouts or any other way excep through the Upwork platform. Report the job if you can find it. Maybe in your proposals? Flag the job and be more careful about communication on - and only on - the platform.Please don't apply to any more jobs until you thoroughly understand the TOS. There is a lot of information about scams - read it before you get in trouble.
messages.Jennifer M: oooh you got graded. What grade did you get?
